detectors.description: RaffleTokenExchange.buyRaffle(uint256[],uint256[]) (buggy_29.sol#320-345) has external calls inside a loop: listing.seller.transfer(amountToPay) (buggy_29.sol#333)

detectors.description: RaffleTokenExchange.buyRaffle(uint256[],uint256[]) (buggy_29.sol#320-345) has external calls inside a loop: require(bool,string)(raffleContract.transferFrom(listing.seller,msg.sender,amount),Token transfer failed!) (buggy_29.sol#336)
